mapper.select: SELECT row_index, col_index, type, name, color, rowspan, colspan, is_base FROM shop_layouts WHERE shop_id = #{shopId} AND is_deleted = false AND is_base = true
SELECT row_index, col_index, type, name, color, rowspan, colspan, is_base FROM shop_layouts WHERE shop_id = #{shopId} AND is_deleted = true AND type = 'table'
mapper.update: UPDATE shop_layouts SET is_deleted = true, updated_at = NOW() WHERE shop_id = #{shopId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shop_layouts ( shop_id, row_index, col_index, type, name, color, rowspan, colspan, is_base, is_deleted, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{shopId}, #{item.rowIndex}, #{item.colIndex}, #{item.type}, #{item.name}, #{item.color}, #{item.rowspan}, #{item.colspan}, #{item.isBase}, false, NOW() ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE type = VALUES(type), name = VALUES(name), color = VALUES(color), rowspan = VALUES(rowspan), colspan = VALUES(colspan), is_base = VALUES(is_base), is_deleted = false, updated_at = NOW()
